channel.title: apache on Morgoth
channel.description: Recent content in apache on Morgoth

item.title: Apache
item.description: Apache https://github.com/apache/httpd http://httpd.apache.org/ ubuntu/debian： sudo aptitude install apache2 redhat/centos/fedora: $ sudo yum install httpd2 启动服务器： service apache2 start 启动浏览器查看： http://localhost:80 apache命令 apache2ctl: // 检查配置 $ apache2ctl configtest a2ensite // 启用一个站点
